item.description:
NetSAP Boston invites our gal members out for a night at Max Brenner's for a scrumptious meal at this hip restaurant in Back Bay..

With complimentary desserts to follow! What better way to meet new people and make new girl friends than via dining on savory foods and awesome chocolate treats!

Spots are limited so please RSVP asap.
We'll be headed to some bars afterwards in the Back Bay area for those willing to hang out afterwards!!
(Please note that NetSAP will reimburse for dessert ONLY. Individuals are responsible for their meal expenses)

Date: June 14
Time: 6:30 PM

Female Members: FREE
Female Non-members: $10

Please register here: http://www.membership.netip.org/assnfe/ev.asp?ID=173

To learn more about NetSAP Boston, visit www.netsapboston.org

'Like' us on facebook www.facebook.com/netsapboston
item.name: It's Ladies Night, and the Feeling's RIGHT!
